Complete and total adoration,
My gift to you, my heart was yours.
In ten weeks you shaped it, 
In one night you murdered it.
Torn from my chest and laid at your feet,
That first step that you took was the worst.
Since then you've walked a thousand miles in solace and short remark,
And I still have these memories,
But we'll never see what we could have been.
Remember when we talked about where we'd be a year from now?
Remember when you held my hand like you'd never let it go?
Remember. cause that's all you can do.
We'll never make another memory,
We'll never make another memory.
I wish I'd have died in your arms the last time we were together,
So I wouldn't have to wake without you today.
This time I thought things were real.
You said they were.
What happened?
You were a priority, 
Was I an option?
I let you see a side of me that I don't share with anyone.
Promises are just words unless they are fulfilled.
you knew from the beginning all I had to offer you was my heart,
I'm sorry that wasn't enough.
So, we'll go our own ways,
And hopefully you'll remember the things I've told you,
Hopefully you'll understand that everything I said was in sincerity.
A broken heart is not what I wanted from this,
But I guess I've learned from it.
But aren't you supposed to learn from your mistakes?
I don't consider this a mistake,
I just wish the story didn't end this way,
Cause I'm still in love with the person who helped me write it.
Remember when you held my hand like you'd never let it go?
Remember when we talked about where we'd be a year from now?

wow, i had i really wierd dream last night.  first it started off awesome.  it was around the end of september and i was still living in halifax but so were my parents and i was over visiting them at the time.  i was starting to get back with allison and everything started looking up for me.  all of a sudden i hear an announcment on tv that said to evacuate halifax immediately because there was about to be a huge nuclear explosion.  i looked out the window and i could see accross the harbour where the explosion was going to come from.  these two or three huge smoke stacks started pouring out nuclear gas all over dartmouth and filled the entire sky with toxic gas and the clouds turned bright red and orange colors.  suddenly on of the smoke stacks erupted and took out most of dartmouth.  
during this me and my family were getting a few things together so we could leave immediately and be out of harms way.  we only took a few basic things that we really wanted to keep like my guitar and my cd's.  and we grabbed a few clothes as quickly as we could before everything in halifax was demolished.  the whole time i was worried sick about allison and how she would get out of this.  after a few minutes a there was a second explosion which took out more of dartmouth.  after we got in the car i had to go back and get allison to make sure she would be ok.  i told my parents that the drive was a quicker way to get out of halifax anyways and she would probably be ready when we got there because i wasn't leaving without her.  i said i would stay and get her myself if it came down to it, so the decided it was alright since it was a quicker way out of halifax.
as we were all getting into the car and driving away as fast as we could we saw all the ships in the harbour trying to get out and onto the ocean out of the way of the final explosion.  we were driving and we could see the final explision about to happen.  all of dartmouth, the ground, the buildings and even the harbour were violently shaking and rumbling.  people were outside dying and burning alive and you could hear painful screams across the harbour.  as we were on our way to get allison the last of the explosions occured.  this was by far the biggest explosion, but it was completely quite.  just as the explosion, gas and nuclear waste dispersed all over dartmouth and halifax and just reached us i could start to feel my skin burning and melting away and everything in the path of the explosion was desintegrating right in front of my eyes.  even the house i was in at the time just seemed to disapear as the explosion hit me.
the dream was really vivid.  when the first explision happened i could feel the heat off of it and i saw things blow up just like in the movies.  pretty fucked up eh?

i know this is pretty much over, but i had a great weekend with you.  i just want you to know that i love you, i am in love with you and i always will be.  i will never forget you.  there will be so many memories that will probably bring tears to my eyes just thinking of them.  and we had a lot.  i dont want this to be over, i want to be with you.  you know how i feel about you and you know that i want to be with you.  its going to be hard to look down at my hand and see the ring that you gave me or feel the chain around my neck or wear this hat.  It is going to be hard to go anywhere in the corolla because of all the memories that go along with it.  the camping trips, beach nights, liqour runs to wentworth, to the movies, moncton, to halifax to see you, our little parking sessions, the cougar, prom, graduation for the both of us, sitting and talking in the driveway, use of head room, and even when the cops stopped us.  i can remember all the times we just went driving to be alone and talk.  the night i got caught with my ass in the air at the shooting range.  hitting the shovel.  teaching you to drive.  i still remember all the times we went camping.  those were some good times.  wentworth, five islands, to the waterfall.  i remember the day that first got to see you naked as i rubbed your back for you in your upstairs hallway.  all the little internet cartoons that you have got me hooked on.  the times we played guitar at the foot of my stairs and watched movies on my computer.  all the fourwheeling trips we went on.  when i came to PEI for you.  

these last two and half years flew by.  it feels like i just started dating you, the time has flew so fast and its already over.  too many memories to mention.  but i will not forget them.  they will always be with me.  i will forever be yours and you know it.  i wish i could say the same about you.  i wish you were still mine.  i wish we could still be together.  i love you and i will always love you.

But i dont regret it.  It was a wise choise.  I guess i wouldnt be where I am now if I hadnt have moved.

I wish i was the only one for you.  The right one.  Like the old days.  I wish we could talk to each other more openly about anything, just shoot the shit.  I wish that i could come home and have you waiting with open arms to greet me and ask me how my day was and then we would sit down and have a cup of coffee and sit and talk and talk and talk, about anything and everything.  I wish i could do the same for you.  I wish i could be the one you come home to and ask how your day ways and take your jacket and hang it up and take your shoes off for you and give you a nice foot or back rub while we have a nice conversation about anything.  Maybe i just want to be a domestic house husband and cook for you and wait on you hand and foot and get you drinks while you lay in bed and bring you home flowers and treats after work.  Is it bad that i want to be your Mr. Right?  Im failing at it.  Im sorry.  You know i mean well.  I just suck at pleasing you.

I only went to get your fuckin food for you and you bitched at me for what?  Why the hell were you so pissed off?  You say you had a bad day yesterday but did you have to take it out on me? Do you even want it to be fixed and better?  I sure do.  Ive been trying desperately.  I love you and you know that.  It really fucking hurts to love you.  But i do anyways.  I have an unconditional love for you thats not going to change.

But i have told you over and over what was really bothering me and nothing has changed.  The last time that I told you i wanted something changed we went on a "break".  Nothing ever came of it.  Well im going to tell you again, like it or not.

He has been a big part of our relationship.  It fucking sucks.  He means more to you than I do.  He always has.  Yes, i am pretty fucking jealous of your relationship because we dont have that.  We used to but somewhere along the way it just stopped.  I wish you could see things through my eyes and feel what i do.

Sorry to keep bitching about him to my freinds but if i talk to you about it you get pissed off and defend him but i bet you wouldnt defend me.  I obviously cant vent to you about him so i have to go somewhere else.  You know that little article in the Comso magazine?  Yeah, well it tells the truth.  Your little relationship with him is fucking me up pretty bad.  Yes, i do have serious rage issues with him as you can plainly see.  But you do nothing to change that. Yes, i probably could have went over to Melanies to drink with her but i chose to spend my time with you.

It also seem like you are pretty jealous of me hanging out with her.  Why?  I have no idea.  You have no reason to be jealous.  What, do you think something is going to happen and im going to cheat on you?  HA, yeah right, not with her husband there too.  SO personally, i think that little article about me cheating on you didnt apply to me.

And back to the Kent issue.  Still hurt by what he has been saying behind your back?  Im just a little pissed off at him.  Now i do have a good reason to hate him.  Would you be pissed off at Melanie if she went behind my back and told a bunch of lies?  Some freind he is eh? Oh, heres a question for you.  Why can't we both hang out when he is down for the weekend?  I dont see why we cant.  You know i would be fucking civil towards him.  Im not gonna fuckin say anything and start shit.  All i wanna do is hangout with my girlfreind and have some fun.  But nope, it would probably be a little awkward with us both being in the same room wouldnt it?  I have no problem with it. You would probably be a little hurt if i have another woman over for the weekend at my apartment and didnt let you come over.  You would probably be a little curious to whether or not im being faithful too.  Here is a little info for you.  I have always and always will be faithful to you.  No matter how drunk i am and no matter how mad i am at you or how much temptation may be there.  I will always be faithful.

So yeah, looks like most of the problems in our relationship happen because of him.  Hes tried to take you away from me numerous times and still is trying.  And now hes trying to make you choose between us?  Some good freind he is.  Sorry to say, but i think a "best freind" should be there to help you out and support you and be happy for you and your relationship.  Not try to take it away and fuck it up.  Personally, i would have a little respect for another couple.  I would leave them the fuck alone, not try to split them up and not make her choose between me or her boyfreind.  I wouldnt talk all lovey dovey to her and i wouldnt spent the night at her house alone or in the same room or on the same bed.  For reasons that the boyfreind would probably be a little pissed off (like me) and probably kick my ass.  Maybe im just a little old fashioned, but i do believe in monogomy.
